attributes.action: HELP Crimes Against Humanity, Genocide, WAR Crimes & HRA Redress & Report Errors
attributes.additional_details:
Govt Compel 1= Acceptance of Crimes Against Humanity, Genocide & War Crimes as fitting elements of sexual, physical &/or psychological abuse in clauses of redress schemes. 

Compel 2= Registers to be Held on Elements of War Crimes etc. To inform & reduce errors. 

Compel 3= Schemes to reveal stats on atrocities, esp planned harm. 

Compel 4= Agencies & pros stated in redress clauses, to also be public authorities (HRA S.6)

UK Law might guide others to peace eg Tigray War - Russian & Ukraine War
attributes.background:
UK Govt must 'STOP Impunity' issues & recognition failures of historical, present & future Crimes Against Humanity etc.

When a 'Public Authority' sets up an 'Abuse Redress Scheme' that responds & deals with survivors & victims of abuse.

Govt to create laws for clauses in Abuse Redress Schemes.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to do, or what you mean by "Abuse Redress Schemes".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
